alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 2:02AM EDT until May 20 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN EDGECOMBE COUNTY... At 201 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Macclesfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tarboro, Princeville, Pinetops, Macclesfield and Conetoe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
